Name: EnterVR
About the game: Entervr is a cartoon style bow and crossbow tower anti shooting VR game. It is an award-winning work in Qualcomm XR competition. At present, the game has two modes: single player breakthrough and online cooperation. The goal is to resist alien creatures and guard the crystal from being destroyed by the enemy. You will hold bow and crossbow weapons and launch skills to fight against monsters from all over the sea, land and air. The enemy is pressing! All round attack pattern attack! The battle of energy crystal attack and defense is imminent! Find out the mysterious power of those alien creatures, cooperate with detonating props, unite neutral creatures and protect your VR world! Game features: deeply optimized bow and crossbow operation feel, real physical attack experience; Flexible weapon loading and unloading and skill trigger operation; Beautiful game scenes, rich interactive props and playable character configuration only bring you a new experience of bow and crossbow shooting VR game! -------------------------------------------Gorgeous dividing line-------------------------------- Game controls: 1. Use the VR handle ray and trigger key to select the menu. In the level (non novice tutorial mode), press the left menu key to call up the menu, and press the right touch pad key to switch weapons (after unlocking new weapons) 2. Long bow operation: hold the bow with the left hand, put the arrow on the bow with the right hand, press and hold the trigger key of the index finger and pull the arrow backward. Release the trigger key of the index finger of the right hand to shoot the arrow. After pulling the bow, long press the trigger of the right hand to trigger the skill: fatal strike 3. Double crossbow operation: hold the crossbow with both hands, press the trigger key to launch the crossbow and arrow, and long press the trigger key to trigger the skill: ten thousand arrows at once -------------------------------------------Gorgeous split line + 1-------------------------------- Further instructions: For more instructions on hidden eggs and playing methods in the game, please refer to the entervr game manual on this page.
